title: Welcome, stranger!
content: What's up? I'm Nicholas and this is my page. For now, there is not a lot to see here, though feel free to check out my CV or reach out to me under any of my social profiles. I'm an engineer with interest in working with state-of-art back end and DevOps tech such as Kubernetes, containers, AWS... you name it. Occasionally, I do front end stuff as well such as this website. In the past I have also dabbled with Blockchain/Ethereum, mobile app development for Android and much more. When I'm not busy writing and afterwards fixing my own code, you may find me running, listening to semi-obscure music or doing the latter two things at the same time.
